title: File preview anything
label: File previews
text: Easily view any type of media you have, with support for video and audio previews.

title: Miller based column view
label: Column view
text: Slick column navigation so you can quickly dig down into multiple folders.

title: List view for detailed info
label: List view
text: Traditional list view so you can easily view important info on your media.

title: Multi select actions
label: Multi select actions
text: Multi import and multi export, with the abilily to select multiple files from multiple folders.

title: Path settings
label: Path settings
text: If you know the exact path of your file, you can easily paste it in and navigate straight to it.
